hibernate-mapping.query: select a from View a, BusinessEntity be where be.Application.Id = :applicationId and a.BusinessEntity.Id = be.Id
from View a where a.Name like :viewName and a.BusinessEntity.Name like :entityName and a.Application.Id = :applicationId
select distinct a.CustomDLLName from View a where a.Application.Id = :applicationId
from View a where a.Name like :viewName and a.BusinessEntity.Name like :entityName and a.Title like :title and a.Application.Id = :applicationId
from View a where a.Name like :viewName and a.BusinessEntity.Name like :entityName and a.Title like :title and a.Application.Id = :applicationId and a.Type = 1

from View a where a.Name like :viewName and a.BusinessEntity.Name like :entityName and a.Title like :title and a.Application.Id = :applicationId and exists ( select 1 from Dialog d where d.InterfaceView.Id = a.Id and d.Type = :dialogType )
from View v where v.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or v.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
from View v where v.Application.Id = :applicationId and v.Name = :viewName
select v from View v where v.Application.Id = :applicationId
